creator: Filip.L_Ecluse@alcatel.be
text:
... and this is causing me a lot of troubles because I use XSL stylesheet to
process these output files.
Why the xml format has changed? Is there a way to bring back the old syntax?
Please note that now also the XSL stylesheet from
http://www.programmerplanet.org/ant-jmeter/ does not work any more.
Anyway, here is a patch that partially solves the problem (I still did not
understood where - and why - in your code you changed 'sampleResult' into
'sample', but I'll leave it to you).

Have Fun!

Created attachment 15229
modifications here will solve the bug
creator: Filip.L_Ecluse@alcatel.be

text:
The new formats for JTL and JMX files are currently subject to change.

The old formats can still be generated if required by using the file_format.xxx
properties - see jmeter.properties.

By the way, when posting patches, please use diff-style patches (except for new
code).
creator: sebb@apache.org
